00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00030 #include<iostream>
00031 
00032 class SumTree;
00033 
00034 // In some comments below, the integers in the list are referred to as
00035 //      A[0], ... , A[my_size-1]
00036 
00037 class Sums {
00038   int my_size;                  // number of integers in the list
00039   SumTree * my_tree;            // binary tree for storing integers and
00040                                 // partial sums
00041 public:
00042   Sums(int n);
00043   // POST: the list has n integers indexed 0 to n-1 and all are == 0
00044 
00045   ~Sums();
00046   // POST: memory for the list has been deallocated
00047 
00048   int size() const { return my_size; }
00049 
00050   void increment(int index);
00051   // PRE: 0 <= index < size() 
00052   // POST: A[index] == A[index]<before> + 1
00053 
00054   int sum(int LB, int UB) const;
00055   // PRE: 0 <= LB && UB < size()
00056   // POST: retval == A[LB] + A[LB+1] + ... + A[UB]
00057 };
